participants.name: David
participants.description: Controller example for the Robot Wrestling Tournament. Demonstrates how to use a sensor, here an accelerometer to detect a fall. Depending on the fall direction, the robot will play a different motion, which is implemented by a simple Finite State Machine. Beats Charlie by getting up after being knocked down.

participants.name: Alice
participants.description: Minimalist controller example for the Robot Wrestling Tournament. Demonstrates how to play a simple motion file.

participants.name: Charlie
participants.description: Controller example for the Robot Wrestling Tournament. Demonstrates how to access the LEDs and play a custom motion file. Beats Bob by moving forwards and pushing him to the ground.

participants.name: Bob
participants.description: Demonstrates how to use the Motion_library class to play a motion file. Beats Alice by moving forwards and therefore having a higher coverage.
